Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "if \$prop(this.trait:wood) = none then set this.trait:brief to wood else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:wood)"

"set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:wood) = none then set this.trait:examine to A wood else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), with \ set into the pommel. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The blade is engraved with \$sam(\) near the guard."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0110 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "if \$prop(this.trait:wood) = none then set this.trait:brief to wood else set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:wood)"

"set this.trait:brief to \$prop(this.trait:brief) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: set this.trait:look to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) = none then set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look). else set this.trait:look to \$prop(this.trait:look) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design."
"if \$prop(this.trait:wood) = none then set this.trait:examine to A wood else set this.trait:examine to \$sam(\)"

"set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: if \$prop(this.trait:design) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) of \$prop(this.trait:design) design"
"if \$prop(this.trait:stone) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine), with \ set into the pommel. else set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:symbol) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The blade is carved with \$sam(\) near the guard."

"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then goto 0110 else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) \<\> none then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" has been skillfully executed."
"if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then set this.trait:examine to \$prop(this.trait:examine) You note the professional mark of \$prop(this.trait:mastermark)."
"if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = nil then exit true else if \$prop(this.trait:inscription) = none then exit true else if \$obj(actor) = \$obj(env.this) then goto 0030"
"emit.actor You must be holding \$brief(this) to do that. :: exit false"
"emit.actor The inscription \\"\$prop(this.trait:inscription)\\" is visible upon \$brief(this). :: exit false"
